dct_title_s: خريطة العراق الأثرية / مديرية الآثار القديمة العامة، بغداد.
dct_description_sm: Ancient sites from 18 historical time periods from the Paleolithic to the Islamic age are located. Acillary map:  Kharīṭat tubayyin majari al-anhar fi al-azminah al-qadimah = [Map showing the courses of the rivers in ancient times]. Scale approximately 1:2,631,680. Includes table of historical periods. Directorate General of Antiquities.
